website_summaries.verdict: You might prefer it if the unique design appeals to you, but other models in the same price-range have more power.
pros: Features an easy-to-clean stainless steel screen
cons: Works a bit slowly compared to more powerful models we considered

customer_reviews.title: The totally unacceptable design defect is that the hole through which the juice pours from the catch basin to the metal spout is tiny and can easily clog. These are inexpensive fixes the manufacturer should ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tribest CS-1000 CitriStar juicer has 2 design defects. One defect is minor, the other is totally unacceptable. The minor defect is that the movable metal spout from whence the juice pours sticks and is difficult to adjust. The totally unacceptable design defect is that the hole through which the juice pours from the catch basin to the metal spout is tiny and can easily clog. These are inexpensive fixes the manufacturer should quickly make.
customer_reviews.author: Sparer

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful at all
customer_reviews.text: According to the instruction booklet, it's recommended that 15 seconds of operation be followed by 15 seconds of rest AND to not operate more than 5 minutes at one time AND allow a few minutes rest before the next use. REALLY??? After using this a couple of times I realized this is not a powerful juicer at all - as the operation manual states, "The Quiet Yet Powerful Citrus Juicer"... I found this to be just the opposite of powerful - almost as if is was running on batteries. Maybe I received a dud, but I'll be returning this soon.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: BEST CITRUS JUICER THERE IS
customer_reviews.text: This is the best citrus juicer out there. I'm disappointed in Tribest that the didn't make the spout in stainless steel, though. But other than that, it makes the juice so quickly that it's a breeze to use and a breeze to clean up and have ready for the next time. I use the juice of one lime mixed with Pellegrino water and Now Better Organic stevia to taste, which are both sold on Amazon, and it's an AWESOME SUBSTITUTE for soda pop. Thank you, Amazon, for selling this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: FREQUENT BUYER

customer_reviews.title: A Reliable Easy to Use Citrus Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I CANNOT live without this citrus juice. I had to replace an old Proctor Silex brand that lasted over 35 years recently. With all of the cheap junk on the market, it was a challenge to find a citrus juicer that could stand up to daily use, is easy to clean and the dimensions I wanted, so it could fit on my counter under the upper cabinets. I LOVE this juicer. I use it multiple times per day and the removable strainer and reamers, (2 different sizes are included!), are washed nightly in the dishwasher. So far, it is holding up beautifully. I will buy again if it becomes necessary. LOVE this so much!
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: So glad i bought this product
customer_reviews.text: After doing quite a bit of research i decided on this product. And I'm very happy i did. Its motor is quiet not so loud that my kids have to cover there ears while waiting for juice. Easy to clean, compact and easy to store. Makes delicious juice that isn't overly pulpy. We like pulp so we don't mind some pulp. My 4 yr old request juice everyday. Our family had been buying the fresh squeezed orange juice from sams club. i wanted a product that would achieve the same juice but without the cost (the sams club model juicer is expensive and so is the gallon of juice). Mission completed and very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: steffy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Juicer for all citrus
customer_reviews.text: Really nice juicer. I use it to juice lemons, limes, other citrus. It has worked consistently well, it runs smoothly, is not too loud (no where near volume of a blender!) and is really easy to clean! Each piece is nestled, and you take one piece off at a time to clean, and put them back one at a time. No fitting issues, just layer on top of each other. Juice stays in tray or can pour out the stainless spout. A small jar or cup fits under the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Terryg

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: NOT powerful and it clogs continuously. RIDICULOUS DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews. Mine clogged in the tiny hole to the spout just after 3 oranges IN THE FIRST USE. Ridiculous design. It also stopped working after less than 30 seconds operation to cool down - then it came back working. It took me a lot of time to squeeze 1.5 quarts of juice and a mess over the counter. Unbelievable. Designers do NOT KNOW NOTHING about this kind of juicer. Returning that immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Ribeiro Jr.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite citrus juicer
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for years and bought one for a family member. These are the best juicer. Easy to use, easy to clean and last a long time. Better yet if it needs repair you can send to the company and they repair on site here in the USA. For me it is just 10 miles away, so I drive mine in if need be. I have had my first one over 12 years with a lot of use and it recently needed some repair. But that is pretty good for all that time.
customer_reviews.author: Llini Ugaz

customer_reviews.title: You'll need to literally juice 20 oranges to get one cup of juice from this
customer_reviews.text: Extremely inefficient and wasteful. I juiced 5 oranges and the amount of pulp that was sitting in the top portion I put back into the used orange peels. It was equivalent to 3 oranges. I got 1/4 cup of juice. The top piece that spins around may also grow mold in the small areas at the bottom. Doesn't even make sense why there are these ridges in this piece, they don't lock into anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sattler

customer_reviews.title: This machine is fun to use and saves so much time
customer_reviews.text: Just used it today to juice a lot of lemons. I was making Ina's lemon bars and also lemonade. This machine is fun to use and saves so much time. The strainer catches all of the seed and any pulp. Cleanup is a breeze and I love that the cord folds up on the bottom for easy storage. I was going to store it, but it's so easy to use that I'm going to make myself some fresh orange juice tomorrow morning. I love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great citrus juicer
customer_reviews.text: Went to AZ and picked all the lemons, oranges and grapefruit on my mother-in-laws trees. Brought it all home and thanks to this baby I was able to juice it all in quick order and I enjoyed the fruits of my labor all summer long. Looking forward to next year.
customer_reviews.author: David C Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer! Easy to use and easy to clean...albeit cannot put components in dishwasher ....not very noisy as far as juicers go...I’ve Had noisier ones. Cost relatively low......the reason for only 4 stars is the fact that the spout connection is plastic and I foresee it breaking of as my last juicer did....a metal hinge at a slightly higher cost would be preferable ....all in all I recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. Connell

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is as described; would purchase again. (I save 5 star ratings for items above and beyond normal expectations.) I'm only writing this because Amazon won't let me just give star ratings without a review.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: the best citrus juicer i have owned!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to compliment our tribest greenstar juicer. The greenstart is a beast of a machine but did not handle citrus well (it wasn't intended to) this citrus juicer is of the same quality we can juice a bag of oranges in minutes. It will juice a whole orange in under 30 seconds. It doesn't bog down or even give a hint of having trouble. We have juiced refrigerated oranges with this machine as well, no problem just does what it's supposed to do. Don't hesitate with this purchase. If you are looking for a quality citrus juicer, you found it! Packaged well and arrived on time as usual
customer_reviews.author: M. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: This is not a quality juicer. The two plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a quality juicer. The two plastic parts wear out and one has shredded. Very concerned that the plastic was ground into my juice. I will spend more money and purchase a quality juicer i.e. Omega.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the CitriStar after my old faithful juicer finally died. I had my eye on the CitriStar for some time. Everything I read about it indicated it was a great juicer, and I'm not the least bit disappointed with it. The CitriStar is definitely worth the investment. It's fairly quiet, doesn't take up a lot of space, and it gets every last drop out of whatever you are juicing. It also has two sizes of domes for smaller and larger fruit and the tray and juicer are easy to clean. The CitriStar is definitely an awesome juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Dali

customer_reviews.title: Used and Dirty!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. The item is being advertised as new and sold as new. I opened my box to find orange particles in the basket, the lid very dirty and juice drips all around the sides. I returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective juicer.
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a Braun that was discontinued. It is more durable and heavier than the Braun but seems to be more effective a extracting juice. Like the Braun you have to press the fruit to make sure the reamer gets all the juice but it goes fast. The drip control works well unless operator error causes a problem. All parts that handle the juice are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mandalay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.text: I spent waaaay too much time reading juicer reviews before I bought this one so I hope it saves someone else the trouble - this is a very good juicer! It's sturdy, the parts are solid, the motor is quiet, and it's very very easy to clean and put back together, basically just three parts that stack, and that's the most important thing because without that I'd never use it. I also like the little spout that you flip up to juice and then down to let it flow into your cup. And it's smaller than I thought it would be (not hulking) and pretty cute. We have fresh oj every morning now. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: KHarrison

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I did have a different brand ,before this one it was stainless steel but a part of it broke and I could not find the part so I decided to buy this one I was scared I wont like it as much but I love it just as much,I use lots of citrus fruits so I always have to have one of these.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer especially for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer I've even owned. Unfortunately, that's been way too many decades! Cleans exceptionally easy. There's pulp but I expected and preferred that the juicer wouldn't remove all the pulp. Only possible weak link is that the spout could be broken if not handled somewhat carefully when cleaning especially if it's left in the dish drainer and other things are carelessly thrown on top. But I knew enough from previous reviews not to damage the spout when done juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: What was that!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable machine!! this juicer is A.M.A.Z.I.N.G. Not only am I able to squeeze the oranges to the last drop, but also very quickly and efficiently. Making juice in the morning became a fun experience I look forward to on a daily basis. What I consider PROS: fast, quick, powerful, sturdy material, light but well built, compact, easily washed, reasonably priced. what I consider CONS: After thinking hard, I am wondering whether there are parts sold for this juicer, just in case something breaks, but frankly, this is a great great great juicer. PS: I owned a Proctor Silex before (for about 8 or 9 years)... going from Proctor Silex to Citristar feels like trading a DAEWOO for an AUDI.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Nice juicer
customer_reviews.text: I was glad it was made in America, the reason I chose this. It works well but unless you lift and hold the spout the juice does not come out. I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Very good juicer and quieter than most.
customer_reviews.text: Really great juicer for citrus. Quieter than most and very efficient. Only reason not 5 stars is juicing parts are not dishwasher safe. (What's up with that????) And I, for one, would rather just have two separate parts for lemons and oranges rather than one that fits over the other. Just harder to keep clean and would be no trouble to change out parts when and if you do lemons. But overall great design and size. Would pay more for the same thing in all stainless design and be much happier. But I have to say it is the best citrus only juicer I have used and I have used plenty of different ones.
customer_reviews.author: cyberspeak

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tried the actual unit yet so this is about an ethical issue.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like this is a return. The tape has obviously been opened before. One side won't seal anymore. I haven't checked the unit itself out yet but I already feel like returning it. No one wants someone else's discards, right? I'll update if it doesn't work or anything is missing. It was also flying around in a HUGE box with a couple of books and some vitamins. I felt like sending the entire box back. They combined 3 or 4 different orders and packed them in a box a TV could fit in. Unacceptable. I WILL return everything the next time that happens. No respect.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best citrus juicer you'll ever own. Absolutely love it. Like the little silicon blocker in the bottom. Very thoughtful.
customer_reviews.author: Lion Heart

customer_reviews.title: I also have put the dirty components in the dishwasher on the top rack away ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago. At first I was a little apprehensive about it so I waited until now to review it. I use mine in an unconventional manner where I "squeeze" lemons for my wife’s water at the rate of about 5 pounds per week. That's all! I might use mine for about 15 to 20 minutes at a time and it has never failed although it has heated up a little. I also have put the dirty components in the dishwasher on the top rack away from the drying elements and have never had a problem. For the $50 or $60 I paid for it I made a great purchase. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BrianK

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with plastic rattling inside so returned it. Second one worked for a short while, then something broke and same plastic rattling noise inside...then stopped working. The short 2 months it worked great. Cheaply made, so many plastic parts break off too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Miriphil

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid product
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this juicer for several months and used it for citrus fruits (grapefruit, oranges). It works well and I like the design. It is attractive and well made. My only (minor) complaint is the box says dishwasher safe and the instructions say do not use in dishwasher. I have cleaned parts in dishwasher once and see no problem with that. Also, the instructions are not clear about how many parts there are to clean (there are 4; 5 counting the cover; I am not counting the base). The spout works well, but its height from a table top is such that tall glasses or containers cannot be used to collect juice; this is not a problem, though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Goldman

customer_reviews.title: This is the most beautiful juicer that I have seen
customer_reviews.text: Pros. This is the most beautiful juicer that I have seen. I wanted to keep it. It looks so good in the kitchen but I gave it to a friend. Universal cone, easy to clean, does the job Cons. It is not so quiet but it is ok. The Dash juicer is quieter. Spout looks flimsy. The motor stops if I press hard on it. the tray that hold the pulp is a little shallow. Over all it is a nice juicer, I had 3 other juicer but I like the Dash the most but the Dash is not perfect either.
customer_reviews.author: Hfghgf

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer on the recommendation of a friend of mine who is also into raw foods. I ordered it, and it arrived quickly. Set up is beyond easy and clean up is a breeze. My option before getting this juicer was to peel and put it through my omega 8004 or to use a manual citrus juicer. When you're juicing 8 oranges at a time, this baby comes in handy. So far I've used limes, oranges, and grapefruit on the juicer and it did well with all of them. The limes were the hardest to keep hold of, but still doable. I recommend this juicer. I believe it's worth the money to invest into it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Overall great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a good juicer. Powerful motor, easy to use, and easy clean up. However There are a few minor annoyances with this juicer. First of all it's parts are not dish washer safe. This really isn't that big of a deal because they are easy enough to clean, I'm just a bit lazy. Secondly the height of the spout doesn't accommodate a very large glass. I have a set of what I call small glasses from Ikea and they don't even fit under the spout. Again, not a huge deal but a bit annoying. Over all it's a great product and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett F.

customer_reviews.title: A very good juicer
customer_reviews.text: I like to make freshly squeezed orange juice for the holidays for the family breakfast. I have children and their spouses and grandchildren to serve. This did a great job in a short time. I like the spout that tips up with a flick of a finger to prevent dripping. I also like to make lime aids and use freshly squeezed lemon juice for sorbet ( there is a smaller head to use for the smaller fruit). This machine works great for that, too. I would recommend this juicer. It is very functional and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: bonesk

customer_reviews.title: BEST juicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my gentleman friend's home because we use mine so much at my home. This is just like the one I have had for about 5 years, and it is still running strong with regular use (at times, daily). It goes through a bag of lemons in no time at all, and it is SO EASY to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Bettie

customer_reviews.title: Transforming a lemon from a solid to a liquid
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. I primarily use it for lemons. There is some pulp, but not very much. It does a great job giving a lot of juice from the lemons. I've had one in the past, but it disappeared (purloined by another fan?). Glad it lived up to the reputation that I remembered from the old one. Hopefully, I will be able to keep this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use this juicer every day. It works well, doesn't slow down when you press down, and cleanup is easy. In other words, What Everyone Else Said. But what I haven't seen mentioned is the ingenious spout that tilts down when you're ready to fill your glass. The juice tray will hold 8 oz. of juice, so you don't have to have a glass under the spout while you're juicing. Even if you want more than 8 oz., you'll probably want to let the juice out and clean the strainer around then. Gives the juicer time to "rest," too. Then you can tilt the spout back up and keep on juicing!
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C, Please, Please, Please!
customer_reviews.text: The Tribest CS-1000 Citristar Juicer is easy to assemble, use, disassemble and clean. From my experience, 1-2 oranges will yield a full glass of juice if you're using low ball height. The juice yield is substantial - the Citristar has no trouble squeezing the living hell out of the oranges. While there are more expensive juicers on the market of higher quality, the CS-1000 is a great alternative for those not looking to drop a fortune. It's functional, simplistic and durable, for the price it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: James, Chase

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Easy to assemble and easy to wash and clean after the only one little thing I did not like about it is that the orange pulp keeps getting stuck while juicing because of the small hole
customer_reviews.author: REEree

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Good citrus juicer, works for limes, lemons and oranges. I haven't tried grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: thomas brust

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: We live in southern California... lots of citrus to preserve. This is a great machine for the value. Has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: It is important to clean with water all the part just after the use.
customer_reviews.text: Despite my second Citrus Juicer was not working properly (the gear inside broke down the third time of use) my experience of the first Juicer (over a year) and of the replacement of the second (about a month of use) is excellent and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Galileo Buzzi-Ferraris

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be a copy of a Philips/Braun juicer that we used to own (lost the top part and it is impossible to find). After looking at all the other juicers available, we concluded that buying one similar to the one we liked was the best option. We were not disappointed with this product. Pro's: - Powerful motor - Can stop the flow (someone incorrectly said that this is not possible) - Seems to extract most if not all the juice Con's: - Not dishwasher safe - but easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: It worked nicely for a week
customer_reviews.text: It broke shortly after I began using it, and it seems the motor failed
customer_reviews.author: GBM

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Superb. Flawless. Can't say enough great things about this. Motor is powerful but surprisingly quiet. Love the pulp control. Spout flow off feature is genious. Height above discharge is great. Someone did a really good job designing and evolving (?) this device. Best I've ever seen or used of its type. Would give to friends and relatives as a gift in a heartbeat and would buy again. I don't think you can do any better than this!
customer_reviews.author: BE Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I use this juicer at least 4 to 5 times a week. We drink homemade lemonade in our house and I don't mind making it any longer with this juicer. It works like a charm, super quick & easy to clean, no mess, and its sturdy. I would definitely recommend this juicer to anyone. It's more than well worth its price!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Juicer You Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how much better this juicer is than the competition. I've owned a few other juicers before and I was always disappointed with the fact that they would fill up quickly. Since there is no tank on this juicer, you don't have to stop to empty it every few minutes. This juicer also has an excellent pulp strainer. It is a one piece steel strainer that cleans very quickly. I wish that I had purchased this juicer years ago and I would not have wasted my time and money on those other tank bottom juicers. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ruminator

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is simple to use, simple to clean, and I use it almost every day! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BerlinsAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great design, quiet, great material quality
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is wonderful. I had a couple of juicers in my past but this one fulfills all expectations. The design with it's tinted juicing part is pretty,and the material is of high quality. It is very easy to wash (I wash it by hand), and I love that it is not as loud as any other juicer I had. There is nothing worse than waking up and having to bare a loud juicer in the morning before you can drink your fresh juice. Also it works smoothly, the juicing process is quickly done. I'm highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mylillian

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to clean and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this juicer and it’s cheap. Very well made for the price. There is no single thing I don’t like. I also have Grenn Star Pro that I love. Way to go Tribest!
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The juicer works fine, just sometimes the juice doesn't drain out easily--we would have to clear the pulp first for it to drain. The metal pulp filter needs improvements as it doesn't filter enough which causes the clog while juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Gotta lemon tree? BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mamba jamba! It's only gonna juice your citrus and that's all I wanted. I have a very happy lemon tree and I decided to juice EVERY last lemon before a hard freeze. This makes easy, and cheap, work of the task. Everything cleans up in the dishwasher, it is INSANELY quiet, simple product! I think I juiced about 40 lemons one night - I had fun with my tribest and I look forward to next lemon season. Absolutely excellant tool for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: JDinTucson

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something to squeeze limes for Gimlets... works great, as advertised... and VERY easy to clean (a great selling point, that not many have mentioned).
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Knystautas

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding juicer at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: We use this juicer in a commercial setting and juice a LOT of citrus fruits with it. It withstands a lot of abuse and the motor is plenty powerful. The two sizes of reamers is great for large and small fruits. One con is that the plastic reamer broke when we dropped it on the floor. I expected it to be a tad more durable - but a quick call to the manufacturer and they replaced it. So in all this is a great product for light to medium duty applications.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Harp

customer_reviews.title: A nice little juicer
customer_reviews.text: Small footprint, easy to clean, not quite as quiet as they lead you to believe (see the utube video), fast. Sooo much better than juicing by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: works well so far
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this item based on the reviews on Amazon, as we frequently do. So far, it has lived up to the other good reviews. There is kind of an odd conflict on the packaging and instructions: package says "dishwasher safe", but instructions say "do not put in dishwasher". We wash by hand so not a problem; I guess something got lost in translation. Be careful when you are finished and tip container to empty everything, as there may be some extra juice in reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like including fresh citrus juices in my diet and this device is very convenient for a family of 4. PROS ---- 1. Juices well, gets all the juice 2. Very easy to clean so daily use is not a hassle 3. Dependable...I've had it for a year with no issues CONS ---- 1. Spout seems to clog but if you gently push on silver spout it will allow juice to flow more freely. 2. Spout is low necessarily to give device a squat, stable operation. If you want to fill a tall pitcher you'll need to put it in a sink so it will fit under the juicer.
customer_reviews.author: clarkchild

customer_reviews.title: N
customer_reviews.text: Slightly bigger but works very well for all sizes of citrus. Its true that you get leftover pulp in the aluminum slats area, but all you have to do is pick it up and spoon it into wherever you desire. It's less noisier than my old one and I don't seem to have to hold down so hard on the citrus I'm juicing. It can move around on my granite counter top if juice gets under the rubber legs, so mop it up and it won't move! Seems very sturdy and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann P

customer_reviews.title: The best in the west!
customer_reviews.text: I was aprehensive in spite of the glowing reviews there were many users that didn't like this juicer. I think it is the very best I've ever had. I've been using it for several months and there are no problems whatsoever. It is extremely easy to clean and I really can't find any fault. If this juicer had a Braun, or any another high quality maker label, it would retail for 3 times higher and people would swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector D. Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: JUICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: It gets ALL the juice! Cuts citrus juicing time in half. Best part, easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: Fills the need - and the juice cup
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this juicer. It makes having fresh squeezed orange juice a breeze. My only concern is that the little spout seems potentially breakable; but no problem yet and I enjoy watching the juice fill my cup.
customer_reviews.author: CatWarmer

customer_reviews.title: works well.
customer_reviews.text: after we bought it few months ago, we've been using it almost each day, for freshly made orange juice. 3 medium orange make a nice cup of orange juice. it's a nice and easy way to consume vitamin C each day. only complaint is that we hoped that all the parts getting into touch with the juice to be made of Stainless Steel, for durability and health concerns. but guess that kind of product won't be in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lu

customer_reviews.title: OJ anyone :-)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Love having fresh orange juice in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This beats all others
customer_reviews.text: My search is over I have gone through for juicers for citrus this one is the best. It's very sturdy is so simple to clean and it works wonderfully I just love this. I don't know what else to say except it doesn't take that much of a footprint on my counter it's convenient to use every morning for fresh orange juice and I've been more active in creating fantastic whiskey sours and other citrus mixed drinks! I recommend it highly to all and don't hesitate this one is a great
customer_reviews.author: Juls

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought a slightly less expensive citrus juicer first and it just didn't have enough juice (the base would spin on the counter if you pressed hard). This juicer is fantastic! I'm sure you could find better if you spent a lot more money, but I wouldn't bother. Produces lots of juice and pulp saves nicely in the tray so you can add it to your drink if you like the pulp. One of our favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.author: DOC

customer_reviews.title: Quick and simple to use juicer.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a simple to use juicer and this was it. I read the reviews and went with it. I love this juicer. It works really well and takes very little effort to use. I definitely would recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: qhlvr2

customer_reviews.title: the reviews I read were very good, and I do my research before buying and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product surpassed my expectation. Yes, the reviews I read were very good, and I do my research before buying and I have been disappointed before. Well, not with this juicer!! My 4 1/2 year old daughter has become the resident juicer. This machine has an ease of use to it, the parts are very easy to take apart and I normally rinse them right after use and then voila, it is put back together in a few seconds and ready for the next use! Love the cord hideaway under the unit. Highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Belan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My first electric juicer, chosen based on price and positive reviews. As others have noted, it is powerful and quiet. I can get more juice out of my citrus compared to the manual presser and more importantly less amount of time and effort. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because the flip lip thingee seems a bit fragile. Other than that, this juicer has worked perfectly after 75 oranges.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this juicer.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this juicer. The juicer will juice limes (using the smaller insert) as well as oranges or larger (using the larger insert). It is easy to use and better yet, easy to clean. I can juice, then switch from a glass to my 4 cup measuring cup but using the easy to use stopper.
customer_reviews.author: C. wadley

customer_reviews.title: BEST midpriced juicer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! It powers through everything from limes to grapefruit in seconds and with ease. Also love the fact that it's super quiet so I can start juicing in the a.m. without waking my children. I've been using a Hamilton Beach and a Cuisinart for the past year, both 'work' but take FOREVER, they never got all of the juice out like this one does. It's definantly worth the few extra bucks!
customer_reviews.author: brookemc

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this juicer for over a year now and although it doesn't get alot of work, when I do use it it is great. It is easy to clean and put back together. It gets alot of juice out of the fruits I've used it on and I've even taken it to work when juicing for my cleanse and it isn't too bulky or heavy to do that. I really do like this juicer for my needs and for the price I think it is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Issy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I can make fresh tangerine juice
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can make fresh tangerine juice, lemonade, orange juice too! The spout does get clogged, but I just keep it open while juicing and it cleans really easy! Washing it's really easy just take apart 3 pieces and it's done! My only objection is that making one cup at a time isn't too practical when you have 5 people that loves fresh juice, so sometimes I use a small bowl. But still love it!
customer_reviews.author: De Henry

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my parents on the recommendation of a raw vegan fruitarian (fruitphile look him up) and they are obsessed with this juicer. They make orange juice like 3 times a day. It is so easy to use and clean. It's the best really. You need it in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Tor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is exactly what I wanted. I didn't want one of the fancy juicers that take an hour to clean. All I wanted was a glass of fresh juice. This is perfect. Put half an orange or lemon or grapefruit on the reamer and even my terrible sore hands can do it easily. It gets right down to the rind in seconds. I can do an entire bag of juicing oranges in just minutes. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Wow- how did I live without this!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is a terrific juicer. I got 2 cups of juice from 5 lemons. I used to use press juicers or hand juiced. When you have a lot of citrus to juice this machine is a joy. Just cut your fruit in half, press on the top and whoosh- the juice is out! It even has a spout that if you lift up, it stops filling your container. So, no drips. Plus, did I mention it is a breeze to clean? Just lift off the top part and rinse. I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ar

customer_reviews.title: Works great on oranges and grapefruits.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. What more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. I was hoping to be able to juice a whole bag of lemons or limes, but it couldn't handle more than one. The funnel gets clogged with pulp quickly. I used a toothpick to help the juice go through for the rest of the bag. It's a very large appliance to store for juicing 1 piece of citrus.
customer_reviews.author: deborah a parrillo

customer_reviews.title: Best Citrus Juicer Period!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this juicer almost daily, and can't recommend it highly enough. Super easy to use - works like a dream. What a little work horse. It takes no time to make a quart of fresh OJ or mojitos for a party. I used a friend's more expensive brand and it doesn't compare to this little gem. Look no further, and don't waste your money on the more expensive name brands!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: It is not as good as the one I had many years ago because ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine works well, has an adequate motor. It is not as good as the one I had many years ago because it is plastic. My prior one had a ceramic cone and a stronger motor. (I lost that one somehow moving). I do like how easy this new one is to clean and the two various sized cones.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel G.'s wife:

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Juiced large and small citrus fruits quickly, with ease, and no waste. I juiced a fairly large amount the first time I used it, and had no problems whatsoever. I like the spout feature, which allows you to click it in an "up" position, preventing juice from coming out once you have stopped juicing (no dripping!). Cleanup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good motor and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Good motor and quiet. Beats the Black and Decker models I have ordered which kept dying.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Eyden

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I like it
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this juicer I absolutely loved it because of how quiet it was something truly nice in the morning however, that quietness did not last. After having this juicer for about a year now for some reason it has become very loud and very close to be annoying. The thing is it does work great and is super easy to clean after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Araica

customer_reviews.title: it juices like I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: it juices like I thought it would, but only gave it 4 stars because the spout doesn't drain the juice as well as id like. I have to hold it down to get all the juice out.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. Toscano

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The best, we use it since few months every day and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Pulp is under control with this baby!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this juicer!! Great for juicing lemons and limes for cocktails!! ❤️ 🍸
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. I have limited arm strength and was concerned about whether I would be able to use it. After posting a question to that effect and receiving encouraging responses and rave reviews, I bought it. It is not at all a problem for me to use. And easy to clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: A Great Citrus Fruit Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this juicer everyday for over a year after buying it from Amazon. It is efficient, easy to clean and priced right. If you like your daily freshly squeezed orange juice, then this is the machine for you. Medium sized oranges work best and hand rinse the parts after each use. I only wish TRIBEST would make this machine with an additional, interchangeable, larger reamer for the larger sized Californian Navel oranges.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Chow

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First let my say I paid an additional $4.00 and got same day delivery. I love you Amazon. I have 3 full grown citrus trees, within 2 days I squeezed 2 gallons of orange juice and 1/2 gallon of grapefruit juice. The motor was quiet and had great torque, this juicer didn't skip a beat. The cleaning was incredibly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Booker D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make orange juice everyday. So easy and fast! Clean up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have Juicer...will travel!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this unit....easy to use, easy to clean....only wish the unit had suction feet or some means to keep it from "traveling" and twisting during operation....some times requires a contortionist to operate and keep spout over the receiving container.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Super citrus juices!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first citus juicer and I chose this product based on the mostly positive reviews, but keeping in mind the negative. I love this product and found absolutely no problems with clogging or difficulty cleaning. I have used it daily for four weeks without a single problem. It is very easy to use. And what a difference from the "just squeezed" brands of juices found in the supermarket! This was a gift for my husband and he just loves it! Thanks Amazon for carrying this item.
customer_reviews.author: SF McKenney

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: we have 2 orange trees in our yard so we juice dozens and dozens of oranges a month. this is a great juicer, exactly what i wanted and for a good price. i've had this for a few months now and even with heavy usage, its holding up great. there is a metal part like a colander that collects all the seeds (if any) and pulp. the juice that comes out is mostly pulp free but you can just add the pulp from that collects in the colander-thing. highly recommended. i would buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: lavendergarden

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a juicer specifically for juicing oranges and grapefruits that we grow in our backyard. Using and cleaning this juicer is so convenient that we are using this juicer everyday and sometimes even twice a day. Cleaning is really easy. take the three pieces apart and rinse them under hot soapy water. You are done!
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great little juicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the reviews. I had a manual juicer and was tired of it. I had never heard of this company, but decided to give it a try. I love this juicer. It is nice and quiet compared to some my friends have and so easy to use. I love that it has 2 size cones. Nice for grapefruit. It cleans like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: spottydog57

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer because my husband drinks juice every morning. Since, fresh juice is so much better for you than bought juice, I knew I had to have this juicer to get all the juice from the oranges! It works great and is a lot less cleanup than a big juicer. I like to juice the orange with the Citristar, then put that juice in my VitaMix and add pineapple to make Pineapple-orange juice. He loves it!! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: kayj1223

customer_reviews.title: Great citrus juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this electric citrus juicer for my 89-year-old Mom who orders yummy oranges from Texas by the box-full and was having a little trouble juicing by hand every day. This juicer is absolutely The Best -- extremely well-made and intuitively designed, of solid production, very simple to use, and very, very easy to clean up. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: NEW

customer_reviews.title: This is the neatest little gizmo
customer_reviews.text: I have read all of the other reviews and that is why I purchased this juicer.We use quite a few lemons and limes and it was always a pain in the neck to get the juice out of them with one of those little gadgets that you have to do it by hand,plus you never get all of the juice.This juicer gets the last drop out of a lemon/lime.Have not tried it on oranges yet.Even my husband likes to play with it.Sometimes I pick the seeds out of it so I can add some of the pulp.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Citrus
customer_reviews.text: This juicer works great and easy to clean. I was looking for a good citrus juicer and went through all the amazon product reviews. This juicer was highly recommended and I am extremely happy with my purchase. It has worked great on grapefruit, lemons and oranges. Very easy to clean, including the strainer, which makes it more attractive to use knowing that the clean-up will not be a pain. I have only had the juicer a couple of weeks so I don't have a comment on longevity. Update: I have now had the juicer for 5 months. Still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow-sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Design!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best citrus juicer I have ever used. It is quick and thorough. As importantly, the design has been well thought out - from disassembly to cleaning. If you want pulp in your juice, this is probably not the one for you. I hope it lasts for decades because I've never had an easier to use, effective juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Duffsgal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric citris fruit reamer!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews of this product, I was surprised that anyone really had any major issues with it. If used as designed and are careful with the "spout", you should expect good results and long operational life. Replacement/spare parts are available from the manufacturer if you loose or break anything. I don't see any other product in this price range that can provide the same performance, or ease of use as compared to this product. The motor is very strong, and I would expect that I will get my money's worth out of it before the motor gives out from use.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy F.

customer_reviews.title: good little juicer
customer_reviews.text: This little juicer does a good job on one orange,but if you need to juice a number of oranges you would have to clear the pulp between oranges. I also push slightly backward on the juicer when I use it as it might tip foreward under pressure. I like it and can juice oranges,lemons and limes with the two reamer sizes. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Tribest CS-1000 CitriStar Electric Citrus Juicer
product_meta.description: Citristar Citrus Juicer - the quiet yet powerful juicer - can start you on your way to better health. With minimal time & effort, Citristar extracts this extremely beneficial juice for you and your entire family. The Citristar’s unique, high-clearance stainless-steel spout prevents clogging and ensures continuous operation. The quiet yet powerful motor makes quick work of all your favorite citrus fruits, making Citristar the only appliance needed for all your citrus juicing needs.
feature_bullets: Favorite citrus fruits to refreshing juices in a snap!
Dimensions 8 W x 8 D x 9.5 H inches.Easy one-touch operation
Juice pours directly into glass for continuous operation
Allows maximum extraction from the smallest limes to the largest grapefruits
Fine screen prevents clogging and is easy to clean

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,098 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
